https://tmrev.io/movie/846733-Being Frank - The Frank Gardner Story 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zdZwDCp03XNrox3Ofbj4OUdFFZW.jpg A one-hour TV movie on BBC TWO about Frank Gardner's story about being an investigative journalist who, while reporting, was captured by al-Qaida gunmen, shot six times and left for dead. He survived, but was paralyzed from the waist down. Being Frank - The Frank Gardner Story
